title: Physical SIM not detected on Pixel 4a in India
content:
I bought a pixel 4a from US. Turns out it is not accepting any physical SIM when I try to use it in India. 

From what I am able to check is that I have a G025J model. Does it limit my use of physical SIM in anyway ?

Is it something that can be fixed manually? Or does Google support assure a repair/return policy on this device ?
